channel.title: privacyjam Blog
channel.description: Updates and posts from privacyjam about privacy, Tor, and digital freedom.

item.title: Why You Should Install an Ad Blocker Today
item.description: Why you should install an AdBlocker today. An AdBlocker stops trackers and minimizes tracking companies like Google, Facebook, and others can do.

item.description: Important: To create an account your must have your safety level below safest, this is so hCaptcha can work.

item.title: Should you use a Bridge with Tor In the U.S? | Privacy Jam
item.description: To start let me give a short overview of what a bridge is, a Tor bridge hides that your connecting to Tor, if you can successfully hide that your using Tor, then you can bypass censorship. Different b

item.title: Should you use a VPN with TOR? | Privacy Jam
item.description: Should you use a VPN with TOR seems like a simple question if you know what a VPN is, yes. Unfortunately it is more complicated then that.

item.title: How to get a Proton Email's Public Key | Privacy Jam
item.description: If you want to get a Proton Email users public key so you can encrypt your messages with them, and don't use Proton mail, here is how you can download their public key from Protons key servers.

item.title: How many People use Tor? | Privacy Jam
item.description: How many people use Tor? How many people use Tor per day? Those are questions I have had for a while, but thanks to the Tor metrics site we can answer that.
